an8.79:1.1: “Atthime, bhikkhave, dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti.
an8.79:1.3: Kammaramata, bhassaramata, niddaramata, sanganikaramata, indriyesu aguttadvarata, bhojane amattannuta, samsaggaramata, papancaramata—
an8.79:1.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, attha dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno parihanaya samvattanti.
an8.79:2.1: Atthime, bhikkhave, dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti.
an8.79:2.3: Na kammaramata, na bhassaramata, na niddaramata, na sanganikaramata, indriyesu guttadvarata, bhojane mattannuta, asamsaggaramata, nippapancaramata—
an8.79:2.4: ime kho, bhikkhave, attha dhamma sekhassa bhikkhuno aparihanaya samvattanti”ti.
